    Lhuqita Fazry

    Founder of Rumah Coding and computer science researcher specializing in computer vision, deep learning, and generative AI, with a focus on applied research and tech education in Indonesia.

    • Depok, Indonesia
    • University of Indonesia

    Developed a Python-based application to analyze emotional expression using Video Swin Transformer.
